talents.name: Spiritual Focus
tooltip: Gives your Flash of Light and Holy Light spells a 14% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage.

talents.name: Improved Seal of Righteousness
tooltip: Increases the damage done by your Seal of Righteousness and Judgement of Righteousness by 3%.

talents.name: Healing Light
tooltip: Increases the amount healed by your Holy Light and Flash of Light spells by 4%.

talents.name: Consecration
tooltip: Consecrates the land beneath Paladin, doing 64 Holy damage over 8 sec to enemies who enter the area.

talents.name: Improved Lay on Hands
tooltip:
Gives the target of your Lay on Hands spell a 15% bonus to their armor value from items for 2 min.
In addition, the cooldown for your Lay on Hands spell is reduced by 10 min.

talents.name: Unyielding Faith
tooltip: Increases your chance to resist Fear and Disorient effects by an additional 5%.

talents.name: Illumination
tooltip: After getting a critical effect from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock heal spell, gives you a 20% chance to gain Mana equal to the base cost of the spell.

talents.name: Improved Blessing of Wisdom
tooltip: Increases the effect of your Blessing of Wisdom spell by 10%.

talents.name: Divine Favor
tooltip: When activated, gives your next Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock spell a 100% critical effect chance.

talents.name: Lasting Judgement
tooltip: Increases the duration of your Judgement of Light and Judgement of Wisdom by 10 sec.

talents.name: Holy Power
tooltip: Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 1%.

talents.name: Holy Shock
tooltip: Blasts the target with Holy energy, causing 204 to 220 Holy damage to an enemy, or 204 to 220 healing to an ally.

talents.name: Improved Devotion Aura
tooltip: Increases the armor bonus of your Devotion Aura by 5%.

talents.name: Redoubt
tooltip:
Increases your chance to block attacks with your shield by 6% after being the victim of a critical strike.
Lasts 10 sec or 5 blocks.

talents.name: Precision
tooltip: Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 1%.

talents.name: Guardian's Favor
tooltip: Reduces the cooldown of your Blessing of Protection by 60 sec and increases the duration of your Blessing of Freedom by 3 sec.

talents.name: Toughness
tooltip: Increases your armor value from items by 2%.

talents.name: Blessing of Kings
tooltip:
Places a Blessing on the friendly target, increasing total stats by 10% for 5 min.
Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

talents.name: Improved Righteous Fury
tooltip: Increases the amount of threat generated by your Righteous Fury spell by 16%.

talents.name: Shield Specialization
tooltip: Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your shield by 10%.

talents.name: Improved Hammer of Justice
tooltip: Decreases the cooldown of your Hammer of Justice spell by 5 sec.

talents.name: Improved Concentration Aura
tooltip: Increases the effect of your Concentration Aura by an additional 5% and gives all group members affected by the aura an additional 5% chance to resist Silence and Interrupt effects.

talents.name: Blessing of Sanctuary
tooltip:
Places a Blessing on the friendly target, reducing damage dealt from all sources by up to 10 for 5 min.
In addition, when the target blocks a melee attack the attacker will take 14 Holy damage.
Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

talents.name: Reckoning
tooltip: Gives you a 20% chance to gain an extra attack after being the victim of a critical strike.

talents.name: One-Handed Weapon Specialization
tooltip: Increases the damage you deal with one-handed melee weapons by 2%.

talents.name: Holy Shield
tooltip: Requires 1 point in Blessing of Sanctuary

Increases chance to block by 30% for 10 sec, and deals 65 Holy damage for each attack blocked while active.
Damage caused by Holy Shield causes 20% additional threat.
Each block expends a charge.
4 charges.

talents.name: Improved Blessing of Might
tooltip: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Blessing of Might by 4%.

talents.name: Benediction
tooltip: Reduces the Mana cost of your Judgement and Seal spells by 3%.

talents.name: Improved Judgement
tooltip: Decreases the cooldown of your Judgement spell by 1 sec.

talents.name: Improved Seal of the Crusader
tooltip: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Seal of the Crusader and the Holy damage increase of your Judgement of the Crusader by 5%.

talents.name: Vindication
tooltip: Gives the Paladin's damaging melee attacks a chance to reduce the target's Strength and Agility by 5% for 10 sec.

talents.name: Conviction
tooltip: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 1%.

talents.name: Seal of Command
tooltip:
Gives the Paladin a chance to deal additional Holy damage equal to 70% of normal weapon damage.
Only one Seal can be active on the Paladin at any one time.
Lasts 30 sec.
Unleashing this Seal's energy will judge an enemy, instantly causing 46 to 51 Holy damage, 93 to 101 if the target is stunned or incapacitated.

talents.name: Pursuit of Justice
tooltip:
Increases movement and mounted movement speed by 4%.
This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.

talents.name: Eye for an Eye
tooltip:
All spell criticals against you cause 15% of the damage taken to the caster as well.
The damage caused by Eye for an Eye will not exceed 50% of the Paladin's total health.

talents.name: Improved Retribution Aura
tooltip: Increases the damage done by your Retribution Aura by 25%.

talents.name: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
tooltip: Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 2%.

talents.name: Sanctity Aura
tooltip:
Increases Holy damage done by party members within 30 yards by 10%.
Players may only have one Aura on them per Paladin at any one time.

talents.name: Vengeance
tooltip: Gives you a 3% bonus to Physical and Holy damage you deal for 8 sec after dealing a critical strike from a weapon swing, spell, or ability.

talents.name: Repentance
tooltip:
Puts the enemy target in a state of meditation, incapacitating them for up to 6 sec.
Any damage caused will awaken the target.
Only works against Humanoids.

talents.name: Improved Eviscerate
tooltip: Increases the damage done by your Eviscerate ability by 5%.

talents.name: Remorseless Attacks
tooltip:
After killing an opponent that yields experience or honor, gives you a 20% increased critical strike chance on your next Sinister Strike, Backstab, Ambush, or Ghostly Strike.
Lasts 20 sec.

talents.name: Malice
tooltip: Increases your critical strike chance by 1%.

talents.name: Ruthlessness
tooltip: Gives your finishing moves a 20% chance to add a combo point to your target.

talents.name: Murder
tooltip: Increases all damage caused against Humanoid, Giant, Beast and Dragonkin targets by 1%.

talents.name: Improved Slice and Dice
tooltip: Increases the duration of your Slice and Dice ability by 15%.

talents.name: Relentless Strikes
tooltip: Your finishing moves have a 20% chance per combo point to restore 25 energy.

talents.name: Improved Expose Armor
tooltip: Increases the armor reduced by your Expose Armor ability by 25%.

talents.name: Lethality
tooltip: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Sinister Strike, Gouge, Backstab, Ghostly Strike, and Hemorrhage abilities by 6%.

talents.name: Vile Poisons
tooltip: Increases the damage dealt by your poisons by 4% and gives your poisons an additional 8% chance to resist dispel effects.

talents.name: Improved Poisons
tooltip: Increases the chance to apply poisons to your target by 2%.

talents.name: Cold Blood
tooltip: When activated, increases the critical strike chance of your next Sinister Strike, Backstab, Ambush, or Eviscerate by 100%.

talents.name: Improved Kidney Shot
tooltip: While affected by your Kidney Shot ability, the target receives an additional 3% damage from all sources.

talents.name: Seal Fate
tooltip: Your critical strikes from abilities that add combo points  have a 20% chance to add an additional combo point.

talents.name: Improved Gouge
tooltip: Increases the effect duration of your Gouge ability by 0.5 sec.

talents.name: Improved Sinister Strike
tooltip: Reduces the Energy cost of your Sinister Strike ability by 3.

talents.name: Improved Backstab
tooltip: Increases the critical strike chance of your Backstab ability by 10%.

talents.name: Precision
tooltip: Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 1%.

talents.name: Endurance
tooltip: Reduces the cooldown of your Sprint and Evasion abilities by 45 sec.

talents.name: Riposte
tooltip:
A strike that becomes active after parrying an opponent's attack.
This attack deals 150% weapon damage and disarms the target for 6 sec.

talents.name: Improved Sprint
tooltip: Gives a 50% chance to remove all movement impairing effects when you activate your Sprint ability.

talents.name: Improved Kick
tooltip: Gives your Kick ability a 50% chance to silence the target for 2 sec.

talents.name: Dagger Specialization
tooltip: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Daggers by 1%.

talents.name: Dual Wield Specialization
tooltip: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 10%.

talents.name: Mace Specialization
tooltip: Increases your skill with Maces by 1, and gives you a 1% chance to stun your target for 3 sec with a mace.

talents.name: Blade Flurry
tooltip:
Increases your attack speed by 20%.
In addition, attacks strike an additional nearby opponent.
Lasts 15 sec.

talents.name: Sword Specialization
tooltip: Gives you a 1% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.

talents.name: Fist Weapon Specialization
tooltip: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Fist Weapons by 1%.

talents.name: Weapon Expertise
tooltip: Increases your skill with Sword, Fist and Dagger weapons by 3.

talents.name: Aggression
tooltip: Increases the damage of your Sinister Strike and Eviscerate abilities by 2%.

talents.name: Adrenaline Rush
tooltip: Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 100% for 15 sec.

talents.name: Master of Deception
tooltip: Reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while in Stealth mode.

talents.name: Opportunity
tooltip: Increases the damage dealt when striking from behind with your Backstab, Garrote, or Ambush abilities by 4%.

talents.name: Sleight of Hand
tooltip: Reduces the chance you are critically hit by melee and ranged attacks by 1% and increases the threat reduction of your Feint ability by 10%.

talents.name: Elusiveness
tooltip: Reduces the cooldown of your Vanish and Blind abilities by 45 sec.

talents.name: Camouflage
tooltip: Increases your speed while stealthed by 3% and reduces the cooldown of your Stealth ability by 1 sec.

talents.name: Initiative
tooltip: Gives you a 25% chance to add an additional combo point to your target when using your Ambush, Garrote, or Cheap Shot ability.

talents.name: Ghostly Strike
tooltip:
A strike that deals 125% weapon damage and increases your chance to dodge by 15% for 7 sec.
Awards 1 combo point.

talents.name: Improved Ambush
tooltip: Increases the critical strike chance of your Ambush ability by 15%.

talents.name: Setup
tooltip: Gives you a 15% chance to add a combo point to your target after dodging their attack or fully resisting one of their spells.

talents.name: Improved Sap
tooltip: Gives you a 30% chance to return to stealth mode after using your Sap ability.

talents.name: Serrated Blades
tooltip:
Causes your attacks to ignore 0 of your target's Armor and increases the damage dealt by your Rupture ability by 10%.
The amount of Armor reduced increases with your level.

talents.name: Heightened Senses
tooltip: Increases your Stealth detection and reduces the chance you are hit by spells and ranged attacks by 2%.

talents.name: Preparation
tooltip: When activated, this ability immediately finishes the cooldown on your other Rogue abilities.

talents.name: Dirty Deeds
tooltip: Reduces the Energy cost of your Cheap Shot and Garrote abilities by 10.

talents.name: Hemorrhage
tooltip:
An instant strike that damages the opponent and causes the target to hemorrhage, increasing any Physical damage dealt to the target by up to 3.
Lasts 30 charges or 15 sec.
Awards 1 combo point.

talents.name: Premeditation
tooltip:
When used, adds 2 combo points to your target.
You must add to or use those combo points within 10 sec or the combo points are lost.

talents.name: Unbreakable Will
tooltip: Increases your chance to resist Stun, Fear, and Silence effects by an additional 3%.

talents.name: Wand Specialization
tooltip: Increases your damage with Wands by 5%.

talents.name: Silent Resolve
tooltip: Reduces the threat generated by your spells by 4%.

talents.name: Improved Power Word: Fortitude
tooltip: Increases the effect of your Power Word: Fortitude and Prayer of Fortitude spells by 15%.

talents.name: Improved Power Word: Shield
tooltip: Increases the damage absorbed by your Power Word: Shield by 5%.

talents.name: Martyrdom
tooltip:
Gives you a 50% chance to gain the Focused Casting effect that lasts for 6 sec after being the victim of a melee or ranged critical strike.
The Focused Casting effect prevents you from losing casting time when taking damage and increases resistance to Interrupt effects by 10%.

talents.name: Inner Focus
tooltip: When activated, reduces the Mana cost of your next spell by 100% and increases its critical effect chance by 25% if it is capable of a critical effect.

talents.name: Meditation
tooltip: Allows 5% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.

talents.name: Improved Inner Fire
tooltip: Increases the Armor bonus of your Inner Fire spell by 10%.

talents.name: Mental Agility
tooltip: Reduces the mana cost of your instant cast spells by 2%.

talents.name: Improved Mana Burn
tooltip: Reduces the casting time of your Mana Burn spell by 0.25 secs.

talents.name: Divine Spirit
tooltip: Holy power infuses the target, increasing their Spirit by 17 for 30 min.

talents.name: Force of Will
tooltip: Increases your spell damage by 1% and the critical strike chance of your offensive spells by 1%.

talents.name: Power Infusion
tooltip:
Infuses the target with power, increasing their spell damage and healing by 20%.
Lasts 15 sec.

talents.name: Healing Focus
tooltip: Gives you a 35% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any healing spell.

talents.name: Improved Renew
tooltip: Increases the amount healed by your Renew spell by 5%.

talents.name: Holy Specialization
tooltip: Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 1%.

talents.name: Spell Warding
tooltip: Reduces all spell damage taken by 2%.

talents.name: Divine Fury
tooltip: Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Heal and Greater Heal spells by 0.1 sec.

talents.name: Holy Nova
tooltip:
Causes an explosion of holy light around the caster, causing 28 to 32 Holy damage to all enemy targets within 10 yards and healing all party members within 10 yards for 52 to 60.
These effects cause no threat.

talents.name: Blessed Recovery
tooltip: After being struck by a melee or ranged critical hit, heal 8% of the damage taken over 6 sec.

talents.name: Inspiration
tooltip: Increases your target's armor by 8% for 15 sec after getting a critical effect from your Flash Heal, Heal, Greater Heal, or Prayer of Healing spell.

talents.name: Holy Reach
tooltip: Increases the range of your Smite and Holy Fire spells and the radius of your Prayer of Healing and Holy Nova spells by 10%.

talents.name: Improved Healing
tooltip: Reduces the Mana cost of your Lesser Heal, Heal, and Greater Heal spells by 5%.

talents.name: Searing Light
tooltip: Increases the damage of your Smite and Holy Fire spells by 5%.

talents.name: Improved Prayer of Healing
tooltip: Reduces the Mana cost of your Prayer of Healing spell by 10%.

talents.name: Spirit of Redemption
tooltip:
Upon death, the priest becomes the Spirit of Redemption for 10 sec.
The Spirit of Redemption cannot move, attack, be attacked or targeted by any spells or effects.
While in this form the priest can cast any healing spell free of cost.
When the effect ends, the priest dies.

talents.name: Spiritual Guidance
tooltip: Increases spell damage and healing by up to 5% of your total Spirit.

talents.name: Spiritual Healing
tooltip: Increases the amount healed by your healing spells by 2%.

talents.name: Lightwell
tooltip: Requires 1 point in Spirit of Redemption

Creates a holy Lightwell near the priest.
Members of your raid or party can click the Lightwell to restore 800 health over 10 sec.
Being attacked cancels the effect.
Lightwell lasts for 3 min or 5 charges.

talents.name: Spirit Tap
tooltip:
Gives you a 20% chance to gain a 100% bonus to your Spirit after killing a target that yields experience.
For the duration, your Mana will regenerate at a 50% rate while casting.
Lasts 15 sec.

talents.name: Blackout
tooltip: Gives your Shadow damage spells a 2% chance to stun the target for 3 sec.

talents.name: Shadow Affinity
tooltip: Reduces the threat generated by your Shadow spells by 8%.

talents.name: Improved Shadow Word: Pain
tooltip: Increases the duration of your Shadow Word: Pain spell by 3 sec.

talents.name: Shadow Focus
tooltip: Reduces your target's chance to resist your Shadow spells by 2%.

talents.name: Improved Psychic Scream
tooltip: Reduces the cooldown of your Psychic Scream spell by 2 sec.

talents.name: Improved Mind Blast
tooltip: Reduces the cooldown of your Mind Blast spell by 0.5 sec.

talents.name: Mind Flay
tooltip: Assault the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 75 Shadow damage over 3 sec and slowing their movement speed by 50%.

talents.name: Improved Fade
tooltip: Decreases the cooldown of your Fade ability by 3 sec.

talents.name: Shadow Reach
tooltip: Increases the range of your Shadow damage spells by 6%.

talents.name: Shadow Weaving
tooltip:
Your Shadow damage spells have a 20% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Shadow damage.
This vulnerability increases the Shadow damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 15 sec.
Stacks up to 5 times.

talents.name: Silence
tooltip: Requires 2 points in Improved Psychic Scream
Silences the target, preventing them from casting spells for 5 sec.

talents.name: Vampiric Embrace
tooltip: Afflicts your target with Shadow energy that causes all party members to be healed for 20% of any Shadow spell damage you deal for 1 min.

talents.name: Improved Vampiric Embrace
tooltip: Increases the percentage healed by Vampiric Embrace by an additional 5%.

talents.name: Darkness
tooltip: Increases your Shadow spell damage by 2%.

talents.name: Shadowform
tooltip:
Assume a Shadowform, increasing your Shadow damage by 15% and reducing Physical damage done to you by 15%.
However, you may not cast Holy spells while in this form.

talents.name: Arcane Subtlety
tooltip: Reduces your target's resistance to all your spells by 5 and reduces the threat caused by your Arcane spells by 20%.

talents.name: Arcane Focus
tooltip: Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Arcane spells by 2%.

talents.name: Improved Arcane Missiles
tooltip: Gives you a 20% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles.

talents.name: Wand Specialization
tooltip: Increases your damage with Wands by 13%.

talents.name: Magic Absorption
tooltip:
Increases all resistances by 2 and causes all spells you fully resist to restore 1% of your total mana.
1 sec. cooldown.

talents.name: Arcane Concentration
tooltip:
Gives you a 2% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell hits a target.
The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%.

talents.name: Magic Attunement
tooltip: Increases the effect of your Amplify Magic and Dampen Magic spells by 25%.

talents.name: Improved Arcane Explosion
tooltip: Increases the critical strike chance of your Arcane Explosion spell by an additional 2%.

talents.name: Arcane Resilience
tooltip: Increases your armor by an amount equal to 50% of your Intellect.

talents.name: Improved Mana Shield
tooltip: Decreases the mana lost per point of damage taken when Mana Shield is active by 10%.

talents.name: Improved Counterspell
tooltip: Gives your Counterspell a 50% chance to silence the target for 4 sec.

talents.name: Arcane Meditation
tooltip: Allows 5% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.

talents.name: Presence of Mind
tooltip: When activated, your next Mage spell with a casting time less than 10 sec becomes an instant cast spell.

talents.name: Arcane Instability
tooltip: Requires 1 point in Presence of Mind
Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by 1%.

talents.name: Arcane Power
tooltip:
When activated, your spells deal 30% more damage while costing 30% more mana to cast.
This effect lasts 15 sec.

talents.name: Improved Fireball
tooltip: Reduces the casting time of your Fireball spell by 0.1 sec.

talents.name: Impact
tooltip: Gives your Fire spells a 2% chance to stun the target for 2 sec.

talents.name: Ignite
tooltip: Your critical strikes from Fire damage spells cause the target to burn for an additional 8% of your spell's damage over 4 sec.

talents.name: Flame Throwing
tooltip: Increases the range of your Fire spells by 3 yards.

talents.name: Improved Fire Blast
tooltip: Reduces the cooldown of your Fire Blast spell by 0.5 sec.

talents.name: Incinerate
tooltip: Increases the critical strike chance of your Fire Blast and Scorch spells by 2%.

talents.name: Improved Flamestrike
tooltip: Increases the critical strike chance of your Flamestrike spell by 5%.

talents.name: Pyroblast
tooltip: Hurls an immense fiery boulder that causes 141 to 187 Fire damage and an additional 56 Fire damage over 12 sec.

talents.name: Burning Soul
tooltip: Gives your Fire spells a 35% chance to not lose casting time when you take damage and reduces the threat caused by your Fire spells by 15%.

talents.name: Improved Scorch
tooltip:
Your Scorch spells have a 33% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Fire damage.
This vulnerability increases the Fire damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 30 sec.
Stacks up to 5 times.

talents.name: Improved Fire Ward
tooltip: Causes your Fire Ward to have a 10% chance to reflect Fire spells while active.

talents.name: Master of Elements
tooltip: Your Fire and Frost spell criticals will refund 10% of their base mana cost.

talents.name: Critical Mass
tooltip: Increases the critical strike chance of your Fire spells by 2%.

talents.name: Blast Wave
tooltip: A wave of flame radiates outward from the caster, damaging all enemies caught within the blast for 154 to 186 Fire damage, and dazing them for 6 sec.

talents.name: Fire Power
tooltip: Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 2%.

talents.name: Combustion
tooltip:
When activated, this spell causes each of your Fire damage spell hits to increase your critical strike chance with Fire damage spells by 10%.
This effect lasts until you have caused 3 critical strikes with Fire spells.

talents.name: Frost Warding
tooltip:
Increases the armor and resistances given by your Frost Armor and Ice Armor spells by 15%.
In addition, gives your Frost Ward a 10% chance to reflect Frost spells and effects while active.

talents.name: Improved Frostbolt
tooltip: Reduces the casting time of your Frostbolt spell by 0.1 sec.

talents.name: Elemental Precision
tooltip: Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Frost and Fire spells by 2%.

talents.name: Ice Shards
tooltip: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Frost spells by 20%.

talents.name: Frostbite
tooltip: Gives your Chill effects a 5% chance to freeze the target for 5 sec.

talents.name: Improved Frost Nova
tooltip: Reduces the cooldown of your Frost Nova spell by 2 sec.

talents.name: Permafrost
tooltip: Increases the duration of your Chill effects by 1 sec and reduces the target's speed by an additional 4%.

talents.name: Piercing Ice
tooltip: Increases the damage done by your Frost spells by 2%.

talents.name: Cold Snap
tooltip: When activated, this spell finishes the cooldown on all of your Frost spells.

talents.name: Improved Blizzard
tooltip:
Adds a chill effect to your Blizzard spell.
This effect lowers the target's movement speed by 30%.
Lasts 1.50 sec.

talents.name: Arctic Reach
tooltip: Increases the range of your Frostbolt and Blizzard spells and the radius of your Frost Nova and Cone of Cold spells by 10%.

talents.name: Frost Channeling
tooltip: Reduces the mana cost of your Frost spells by 5% and reduces the threat caused by your Frost spells by 10%.

talents.name: Shatter
tooltip: Requires 2 points in Improved Frost Nova
Increases the critical strike chance of all your spells against frozen targets by 10%.

talents.name: Ice Block
tooltip: You become encased in a block of ice, protecting you from all physical attacks and spells for 10 sec, but during that time you cannot attack, move or cast spells.

talents.name: Improved Cone of Cold
tooltip: Increases the damage dealt by your Cone of Cold spell by 15%.

talents.name: Winter's Chill
tooltip:
Gives your Frost damage spells a 20% chance to apply the Winter's Chill effect, which increases the chance a Frost spell will critically hit the target by 2% for 15 sec.
Stacks up to 5 times.

talents.name: Ice Barrier
tooltip:
Instantly shields you, absorbing 438 damage.
Lasts 1 min.
While the shield holds, spells will not be interrupted.

talents.name: Suppression
tooltip: Reduces the chance for enemies to resist your Affliction spells by 2%.

talents.name: Improved Corruption
tooltip: Reduces the casting time of your Corruption spell by 0.4 sec.

talents.name: Improved Curse of Weakness
tooltip: Increases the effect of your Curse of Weakness by 6%.

talents.name: Improved Drain Soul
tooltip:
Gives you a 50% chance to get a 100% increase to your Mana regeneration for 10 sec if the target is killed by you while you drain its soul.
In addition your Mana may continue to regenerate while casting at 50% of normal.

talents.name: Improved Life Tap
tooltip: Increases the amount of Mana awarded by your Life Tap spell by 10%.

talents.name: Improved Drain Life
tooltip: Increases the Health drained by your Drain Life spell by 2%.

talents.name: Improved Curse of Agony
tooltip: Increases the damage done by your Curse of Agony by 2%.

talents.name: Fel Concentration
tooltip: Gives you a 14% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling the Drain Life, Drain Mana, or Drain Soul spell.

talents.name: Amplify Curse
tooltip:
Increases the effect of your next Curse of Weakness or Curse of Agony by 50%, or your next Curse of Exhaustion by 20%.
Lasts 30 sec.

talents.name: Grim Reach
tooltip: Increases the range of your Affliction spells by 10%.

talents.name: Nightfall
tooltip:
Gives your Corruption and Drain Life spells a 2% chance to cause you to enter a Shadow Trance state after damaging the opponent.
The Shadow Trance state reduces the casting time of your next Shadow Bolt spell by 100%.

talents.name: Improved Drain Mana
tooltip: Causes 15% of the Mana drained by your Drain Mana spell to damage the opponent.

talents.name: Siphon Life
tooltip:
Transfers 15 health from the target to the caster every 3 sec.
Lasts 30 sec.

talents.name: Curse of Exhaustion
tooltip:
Reduces the target's movement speed by 10% for 12 sec.
Only one Curse per Warlock can be active on any one target.

talents.name: Improved Curse of Exhaustion
tooltip: Requires 1 point in Curse of Exhaustion
Increases the speed reduction of your Curse of Exhaustion by 5%.

talents.name: Shadow Mastery
tooltip: Increases the damage dealt or life drained by your Shadow spells by 2%.

talents.name: Dark Pact
tooltip: Drains 150 of your pet's Mana, returning 100% to you.

talents.name: Improved Healthstone
tooltip: Increases the amount of Health restored by your Healthstone by 10%.

talents.name: Improved Imp
tooltip: Increases the effect of your Imp's Firebolt, Fire Shield, and Blood Pact spells by 10%.

talents.name: Demonic Embrace
tooltip: Increases your total Stamina by 3% but reduces your total Spirit by 1%.

talents.name: Improved Health Funnel
tooltip: Increases the amount of Health transferred by your Health Funnel spell by 10%.

talents.name: Improved Voidwalker
tooltip: Increases the effectiveness of your Voidwalker's Torment, Consume Shadows, Sacrifice and Suffering spells by 10%.

talents.name: Fel Intellect
tooltip: Increases the maximum Mana of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter by 3%.

talents.name: Improved Succubus
tooltip: Increases the effect of your Succubus' Lash of Pain and Soothing Kiss spells by 10%, and increases the duration of your Succubus' Seduction and Lesser Invisibility spells by 10%.

talents.name: Fel Domination
tooltip: Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, or Felhunter Summon spell has its casting time reduced by 5.5 sec and its Mana cost reduced by 50%.

talents.name: Fel Stamina
tooltip: Increases the maximum Health of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter by 3%.

talents.name: Master Summoner
tooltip: Reduces the casting time of your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter Summoning spells by 2 sec and the Mana cost by 20%.

talents.name: Unholy Power
tooltip: Increases the damage done by your Voidwalker, Succubus, and Felhunter's melee attacks by 4%.

talents.name: Improved Enslave Demon
tooltip: Reduces the Attack Speed and Casting Speed penalty of your Enslave Demon spell by 2% and reduces the resist chance by 2%.

talents.name: Demonic Sacrifice
tooltip:
When activated, sacrifices your summoned demon to grant you an effect that lasts 30 min.
The effect is canceled if any Demon is summoned.
Imp: Increases your Fire damage by 15%.
Voidwalker: Restores 3% of total Health every 4 sec.
Succubus: Increases your Shadow damage by 15%.
Felhunter: Restores 2% of total Mana every 4 sec.

talents.name: Improved Firestone
tooltip: Increases the bonus Fire damage from Firestones and the Firestone effect by 15%.

talents.name: Master Demonologist
tooltip: Grants both the Warlock and the summoned demon an effect as long as that demon is active.
Voidwalker - Reduces physical damage taken by 2%.
Succubus - Increases all damage caused by 2%.
Felhunter - Increases all resistances by .2 per level.

talents.name: Soul Link
tooltip:
When active, 30% of all damage taken by the caster is taken by your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, or Felhunter demon instead.
In addition, both the demon and master will inflict 3% more damage.
Lasts as long as the demon is active.

talents.name: Improved Spellstone
tooltip: Increases the amount of damage absorbed by your Spellstone by 15%.

talents.name: Improved Shadow Bolt
tooltip:
Your Shadow Bolt critical strikes increase Shadow damage dealt to the target by 4% until 4 non-periodic damage sources are applied.
Effect lasts a maximum of 12 sec.

talents.name: Cataclysm
tooltip: Reduces the Mana cost of your Destruction spells by 1%.

talents.name: Bane
tooltip: Reduces the casting time of your Shadow Bolt and Immolate spells by 0.1 sec and your Soul Fire spell by 0.4 sec.

talents.name: Aftermath
tooltip: Gives your Destruction spells a 2% chance to daze the target for 5 sec.

talents.name: Improved Firebolt
tooltip: Reduces the casting time of your Imp's Firebolt spell by 0.5 sec.

talents.name: Improved Lash of Pain
tooltip: Reduces the cooldown of your Succubus' Lash of Pain spell by 3 sec.

talents.name: Devastation
tooltip: Increases the critical strike chance of your Destruction spells by 1%.

talents.name: Shadowburn
tooltip:
Instantly blasts the target for 87 to 99 Shadow damage.
If the target dies within 5 sec of Shadowburn, and yields experience or honor, the caster gains a Soul Shard.

talents.name: Intensity
tooltip: Gives you a 35% chance to resist interruption caused by damage while channeling the Rain of Fire, Hellfire or Soul Fire spell.

talents.name: Destructive Reach
tooltip: Increases the range of your Destruction spells by 10%.

talents.name: Improved Searing Pain
tooltip: Increases the critical strike chance of your Searing Pain spell by 2%.

talents.name: Pyroclasm
tooltip: Gives your Rain of Fire, Hellfire, and Soul Fire spells a 13% chance to stun the target for 3 sec.

talents.name: Improved Immolate
tooltip: Increases the initial damage of your Immolate spell by 5%.

talents.name: Ruin
tooltip: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Destruction spells by 100%.

talents.name: Emberstorm
tooltip: Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 2%.

talents.name: Conflagrate
tooltip: Ignites a target that is already afflicted by Immolate, dealing 240 to 306 Fire damage and consuming the Immolate spell.

talents.name: Convection
tooltip: Reduces the mana cost of your Shock, Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 2%.

talents.name: Concussion
tooltip: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning and Shock spells by 1%.

talents.name: Earth's Grasp
tooltip: Increases the health of your Stoneclaw Totem by 25% and the radius of your Earthbind Totem by 10%.

talents.name: Elemental Warding
tooltip: Reduces damage taken from Fire, Frost and Nature effects by 4%.

talents.name: Call of Flame
tooltip: Increases the damage done by your Fire Totems by 5%.

talents.name: Elemental Focus
tooltip:
Gives you a 10% chance to enter a Clearcasting state after casting any Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell.
The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%.

talents.name: Reverberation
tooltip: Reduces the cooldown of your Shock spells by 0.2 sec.

talents.name: Call of Thunder
tooltip: Increases the critical strike chance of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by an additional 1%.

talents.name: Improved Fire Totems
tooltip: Reduces the delay before your Fire Nova Totem activates by 1 sec. and decreases the threat generated by your Magma Totem by 25%.

talents.name: Eye of the Storm
tooltip:
Gives you a 33% chance to gain the Focused Casting effect that lasts for 6 sec after being the victim of a melee or ranged critical strike.
The Focused Casting effect prevents you from losing casting time when taking damage.

talents.name: Elemental Devastation
tooltip: Your offensive spell crits will increase your chance to get a critical strike with melee attacks by 3% for 10 sec.

talents.name: Storm Reach
tooltip: Increases the range of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 3 yards.

talents.name: Elemental Fury
tooltip: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Searing, Magma, and Fire Nova Totems and your Fire, Frost, and Nature spells by 100%.

talents.name: Lightning Mastery
tooltip: Requires 5 points in Call of Thunder
Reduces the cast time of your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells by 0.2 sec.

talents.name: Elemental Mastery
tooltip: When activated, this spell gives your next Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell a 100% critical strike chance and reduces the mana cost by 100%.

talents.name: Shield Specialization
tooltip: Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 1% and increases the amount blocked by 5%.

talents.name: Guardian Totems
tooltip: Increases the amount of damage reduced by your Stoneskin Totem and Windwall Totem by 10% and reduces the cooldown of your Grounding Totem by 1 sec.

talents.name: Thundering Strikes
tooltip: Improves your chance to get a critical strike with your weapon attacks by 1%.

talents.name: Improved Ghost Wolf
tooltip: Reduces the cast time of your Ghost Wolf spell by 1 sec.

talents.name: Improved Lightning Shield
tooltip: Increases the damage done by your Lightning Shield orbs by 5%.

talents.name: Enhancing Totems
tooltip: Increases the effect of your Strength of Earth and Grace of Air Totems by 8%.

talents.name: Two-Handed Axes and Maces
tooltip: Allows you to use Two-Handed Axes and Two-Handed Maces.

talents.name: Anticipation
tooltip: Increases your chance to dodge by an additional 1%.

talents.name: Flurry
tooltip: Increases your attack speed by 10% for your next 3 swings after dealing a critical strike.

talents.name: Toughness
tooltip: Increases your armor value from items by 2%.

talents.name: Improved Weapon Totems
tooltip: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Windfury Totem by 15% and increases the damage caused by your Flametongue Totem by 6%.

talents.name: Elemental Weapons
tooltip: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Rockbiter Weapon by 7%, your Windfury Weapon effect by 13% and increases the damage caused by your Flametongue Weapon and Frostbrand Weapon by 5%.

talents.name: Parry
tooltip: Gives a chance to parry enemy melee attacks.

talents.name: Weapon Mastery
tooltip: Increases the damage you deal with all weapons by 2%.

talents.name: Stormstrike
tooltip:
Gives you an extra attack.
In addition, the next 2 sources of Nature damage dealt to the target are increased by 20%.
Lasts 12 sec.

talents.name: Improved Healing Wave
tooltip: Reduces the casting time of your Healing Wave spell by 0.1 sec.

talents.name: Tidal Focus
tooltip: Reduces the Mana cost of your healing spells by 1%.

talents.name: Improved Reincarnation
tooltip: Reduces the cooldown of your Reincarnation spell by 10 min and increases the amount of health and mana you reincarnate with by an additional 10%.

talents.name: Ancestral Healing
tooltip: Increases your target's armor value by 8% for 15 sec after getting a critical effect from one of your healing spells.

talents.name: Totemic Focus
tooltip: Reduces the Mana cost of your totems by 5%.

talents.name: Nature's Guidance
tooltip: Increases your chance to hit with melee attacks and spells by 1%.

talents.name: Healing Focus
tooltip: Gives you a 14% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any healing spell.

talents.name: Totemic Mastery
tooltip: The radius of your totems that affect friendly targets is increased to 30 yd.

talents.name: Healing Grace
tooltip: Reduces the threat generated by your healing spells by 5%.

talents.name: Restorative Totems
tooltip: Increases the effect of your Mana Spring and Healing Stream Totems by 5%.

talents.name: Tidal Mastery
tooltip: Increases the critical effect chance of your healing and lightning spells by 1%.

talents.name: Healing Way
tooltip:
Your Healing Wave spells have a 33% chance to increase the effect of subsequent Healing Wave spells on that target by 6% for 15 sec.
This effect will stack up to 3 times.

talents.name: Nature's Swiftness
tooltip: When activated, your next Nature spell with a casting time less than 10 sec. becomes an instant cast spell.

talents.name: Purification
tooltip: Increases the effectiveness of your healing spells by 2%.

talents.name: Mana Tide Totem
tooltip: Summons a Mana Tide Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 12 sec that restores 170 mana every 3 seconds to group members within 20 yards.

talents.name: Improved Wrath
tooltip: Reduces the cast time of your Wrath spell by 0.1 sec.

talents.name: Nature's Grasp
tooltip:
While active, any time an enemy strikes the caster they have a 35% chance to become afflicted by Entangling Roots (Rank 1).
Only useable outdoors.
1 charge.
Lasts 45 sec.

talents.name: Improved Nature's Grasp
tooltip: Increases the chance for your Nature's Grasp to entangle an enemy by 15%.

talents.name: Improved Entangling Roots
tooltip: Gives you a 40% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting Entangling Roots.

talents.name: Improved Moonfire
tooltip: Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire spell by 2%.

talents.name: Natural Weapons
tooltip: Increases the damage you deal with physical attacks in all forms by 2%.

talents.name: Natural Shapeshifter
tooltip: Reduces the mana cost of all shapeshifting by 10%.

talents.name: Improved Thorns
tooltip: Increases damage caused by your Thorns spell by 25%.

talents.name: Omen of Clarity
tooltip:
Imbues the Druid with natural energy.
Each of the Druid's melee attacks has a chance of causing the caster to enter a Clearcasting state.
The Clearcasting state reduces the Mana, Rage or Energy cost of your next damage or healing spell or offensive ability by 100%.
Lasts 10 min.

talents.name: Nature's Reach
tooltip: Increases the range of your Wrath, Entangling Roots, Faerie Fire, Moonfire, Starfire, and Hurricane spells by 10%.

talents.name: Vengeance
tooltip: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Starfire, Moonfire, and Wrath spells by 20%.

talents.name: Improved Starfire
tooltip: Reduces the cast time of Starfire by 0.1 sec and has a 3% chance to stun the target for 3 sec.

talents.name: Nature's Grace
tooltip: All spell criticals grace you with a blessing of nature, reducing the casting time of your next spell by 0.5 sec.

talents.name: Moonglow
tooltip: Reduces the Mana cost of your Moonfire, Starfire, Wrath, Healing Touch, Regrowth and Rejuvenation spells by 3%.

talents.name: Moonfury
tooltip: Increases the damage done by your Starfire, Moonfire and Wrath spells by 2%.

talents.name: Moonkin Form
tooltip:
Transforms the Druid into Moonkin Form.
While in this form the armor contribution from items is increased by 360% and all party members within 30 yards have their spell critical chance increased by 3%.
The Moonkin can only cast Balance spells while shapeshifted.
The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.

talents.name: Ferocity
tooltip: Reduces the cost of your Maul, Swipe, Claw, and Rake abilities by 1 Rage or Energy.

talents.name: Feral Aggression
tooltip: Increases the Attack Power reduction of your Demoralizing Roar by 8% and the damage caused by your Ferocious Bite by 3%.

talents.name: Feral Instinct
tooltip: Requires 5 points in Feral Combat Talents
Increases threat caused in Bear and Dire Bear Form by 3% and reduces the chance enemies have to detect you while Prowling.

talents.name: Brutal Impact
tooltip: Requires 5 points in Feral Combat Talents
Increases the stun duration of your Bash and Pounce abilities by 0.5 sec.

talents.name: Thick Hide
tooltip: Requires 5 points in Feral Combat Talents
Increases your Armor contribution from items by 2%.

talents.name: Feline Swiftness
tooltip: Requires 10 points in Feral Combat Talents
Increases your movement speed by 15% while outdoors in Cat Form and increases your chance to dodge while in Cat Form by 2%.

talents.name: Feral Charge
tooltip: Requires 10 points in Feral Combat Talents
Requires Bear Form, Dire Bear Form
Causes you to charge an enemy, immobilizing and interrupting any spell being cast for 4 sec.

talents.name: Sharpened Claws
tooltip: Requires 10 points in Feral Combat Talents
Increases your critical strike chance while in Bear, Dire Bear or Cat Form by 2%.

talents.name: Improved Shred
tooltip: Requires 15 points in Feral Combat Talents
Reduces the Energy cost of your Shred ability by 6.

talents.name: Predatory Strikes
tooltip: Requires 15 points in Feral Combat Talents
Increases your melee attack power in Cat, Bear and Dire Bear Forms by 50% of your level.

talents.name: Blood Frenzy
tooltip: Requires 15 points in Feral Combat Talents
Your critical strikes from Cat Form abilities that add combo points  have a 50% chance to add an additional combo point.

talents.name: Primal Fury
tooltip: Requires 15 points in Feral Combat Talents
Gives you a 50% chance to gain an additional 5 Rage anytime you get a critical strike while in Bear and Dire Bear Form.

talents.name: Savage Fury
tooltip: Requires 20 points in Feral Combat Talents
Increases the damage caused by your Claw, Rake, Maul and Swipe abilities by 10%.

talents.name: Faerie Fire (Feral)
tooltip: Requires 20 points in Feral Combat Talents
Requires Cat Form, Bear Form, Dire Bear Form

Decrease the armor of the target by 175 for 40 sec.
While affected, the target cannot stealth or turn invisible.

talents.name: Heart of the Wild
tooltip: Requires 25 points in Feral Combat Talents

Increases your Intellect by 4%.
In addition, while in Bear or Dire Bear Form your Stamina is increased by 4% and while in Cat Form your Strength is increased by 4%.

talents.name: Leader of the Pack
tooltip: Requires 30 points in Feral Combat Talents
While in Cat, Bear or Dire Bear Form, the Leader of the Pack increases ranged and melee critical chance of all party members within 45 yards by 3%.

talents.name: Improved Mark of the Wild
tooltip: Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by 7%.

talents.name: Furor
tooltip: Gives you 20% chance to gain 10 Rage when you shapeshift into Bear and Dire Bear Form or 40 Energy when you shapeshift into Cat Form.

talents.name: Improved Healing Touch
tooltip: Reduces the cast time of your Healing Touch spell by 0.1 sec.

talents.name: Nature's Focus
tooltip: Gives you a 14% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting the Healing Touch, Regrowth and Tranquility spells.

talents.name: Improved Enrage
tooltip: The Enrage ability now instantly generates 5 Rage.

talents.name: Reflection
tooltip: Allows 5% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.

talents.name: Insect Swarm
tooltip: The enemy target is swarmed by insects, decreasing their chance to hit by 2% and causing 66 Nature damage over 12 sec.

talents.name: Subtlety
tooltip: Reduces the threat generated by your Healing spells by 4%.

talents.name: Tranquil Spirit
tooltip: Reduces the mana cost of your Healing Touch and Tranquility spells by 2%.

talents.name: Improved Rejuvenation
tooltip: Increases the effect of your Rejuvenation spell by 5%.

talents.name: Nature's Swiftness
tooltip: Requires 5 points in Improved Healing Touch
When activated, your next Nature spell becomes an instant cast spell.

talents.name: Gift of Nature
tooltip: Increases the effect of all healing spells by 2%.

talents.name: Improved Tranquility
tooltip: Reduces threat caused by Tranquility by 50%.

talents.name: Improved Regrowth
tooltip: Increases the critical effect chance of your Regrowth spell by 10%.

talents.name: Swiftmend
tooltip: Consumes a Rejuvenation or Regrowth effect on a friendly target to instantly heal them an amount equal to 12 sec. of Rejuvenation or 18 sec. of Regrowth.

talents.name: Improved Aspect of the Hawk
tooltip: While Aspect of the Hawk is active, all normal ranged attacks have a 1% chance of increasing ranged attack speed by 30% for 12 sec.

talents.name: Endurance Training
tooltip: Increases the Health of your pets by 3%.

talents.name: Improved Eyes of the Beast
tooltip: Requires 5 points in Beast Mastery Talents
Increases the duration of your Eyes of the Beast by 30 sec.

talents.name: Improved Aspect of the Monkey
tooltip: Requires 5 points in Beast Mastery Talents
Increases the Dodge bonus of your Aspect of the Monkey by 1%.

talents.name: Thick Hide
tooltip: Requires 5 points in Beast Mastery Talents
Increases the Armor rating of your pets by 10%.

talents.name: Improved Revive Pet
tooltip: Requires 5 points in Beast Mastery Talents
Revive Pet's casting time is reduced by 3 sec, mana cost is reduced by 20%, and increases the health your pet returns with by an additional 15%.

talents.name: Pathfinding
tooltip: Requires 10 points in Beast Mastery Talents
Increases the speed bonus of your Aspect of the Cheetah and Aspect of the Pack by 3%.

talents.name: Bestial Swiftness
tooltip: Requires 10 points in Beast Mastery Talents
Increases the outdoor movement speed of your pets by 30%.

talents.name: Unleashed Fury
tooltip: Requires 10 points in Beast Mastery Talents
Increases the damage done by your pets by 4%.

talents.name: Improved Mend Pet
tooltip: Requires 15 points in Beast Mastery Talents
Gives the Mend Pet spell a 15% chance of cleansing 1 Curse, Disease, Magic or Poison effect from the pet each tick.

talents.name: Ferocity
tooltip: Requires 15 points in Beast Mastery Talents
Increases the critical strike chance of your pets by 3%.

talents.name: Spirit Bond
tooltip: Requires 20 points in Beast Mastery Talents
While your pet is active, you and your pet will regenerate 1% of total health every 10 sec.

talents.name: Intimidation
tooltip: Requires 20 points in Beast Mastery Talents
Command your pet to intimidate the target on the next successful melee attack, causing a high amount of threat and stunning the target for 3 sec.

talents.name: Bestial Discipline
tooltip: Requires 20 points in Beast Mastery Talents
Increases the Focus regeneration of your pets by 10%.

talents.name: Frenzy
tooltip: Requires 25 points in Beast Mastery Talents
Gives your pet a 20% chance to gain a 30% attack speed increase for 8 sec after dealing a critical strike.

talents.name: Bestial Wrath
tooltip: Requires 30 points in Beast Mastery Talents

Send your pet into a rage causing 50% additional damage for 18 sec.
While enraged, the beast does not feel pity or remorse or fear and it cannot be stopped unless killed.

talents.name: Improved Concussive Shot
tooltip: Gives your Concussive Shot a 4% chance to stun the target for 3 sec.

talents.name: Efficiency
tooltip: Reduces the Mana cost of your Shots and Stings by 2%.

talents.name: Improved Hunter's Mark
tooltip: Increases the Ranged Attack Power bonus of your Hunter's Mark spell by 3%.

talents.name: Lethal Shots
tooltip: Increases your critical strike chance with ranged weapons by 1%.

talents.name: Aimed Shot
tooltip: An aimed shot that increases ranged damage by 70.

talents.name: Improved Arcane Shot
tooltip: Reduces the cooldown of your Arcane Shot by 0.2 sec.

talents.name: Hawk Eye
tooltip: Increases the range of your ranged weapons by 2 yards.

talents.name: Improved Serpent Sting
tooltip: Increases the damage done by your Serpent Sting by 2%.

talents.name: Mortal Shots
tooltip: Increases your ranged weapon critical strike damage bonus by 6%.

talents.name: Scatter Shot
tooltip:
A short-range shot that deals 50% weapon damage and disorients the target for 4 sec.
Any damage caused will remove the effect.
Turns off your attack when used.

talents.name: Barrage
tooltip: Increases the damage done by your Multi-Shot and Volley spells by 5%.

talents.name: Improved Scorpid Sting
tooltip: Reduces the Stamina of targets affected by your Scorpid Sting by 10% of the amount of Strength reduced.

talents.name: Ranged Weapon Specialization
tooltip: Increases the damage you deal with ranged weapons by 1%.

talents.name: Trueshot Aura
tooltip:
Increases the attack power of party members within 45 yards by 50.
Lasts 30 min.

talents.name: Monster Slaying
tooltip: Increases all damage caused against Beasts, Giants and Dragonkin targets by 1% and increases critical damage caused against Beasts, Giants and Dragonkin targets by an additional 1%.

talents.name: Humanoid Slaying
tooltip: Increases all damage caused against Humanoid targets by 1% and increases critical damage caused against Humanoid targets by an additional 1%.

talents.name: Entrapment
tooltip: Gives your Immolation Trap, Frost Trap, and Explosive Trap a 5% chance to entrap the target, preventing them from moving for 5 sec.

talents.name: Savage Strikes
tooltip: Increases the critical strike chance of Raptor Strike and Mongoose Bite by 10%.

talents.name: Improved Wing Clip
tooltip: Gives your Wing Clip ability a 4% chance to immobilize the target for 5 sec.

talents.name: Clever Traps
tooltip: Increases the duration of Freezing and Frost trap effects by 15% and the damage of Immolation and Explosive trap effects by 15%.

talents.name: Deterrence
tooltip: When activated, increases your Dodge and Parry chance by 25% for 10 sec.

talents.name: Trap Mastery
tooltip: Decreases the chance enemies will resist trap effects by 5%.

talents.name: Surefooted
tooltip: Increases hit chance by 1% and increases the chance movement impairing effects will be resisted by an additional 5%.

talents.name: Improved Feign Death
tooltip: Reduces the chance your Feign Death ability will be resisted by 2%.

talents.name: Killer Instinct
tooltip: Increases your critical strike chance with all attacks by 1%.

talents.name: Counterattack
tooltip:
A strike that becomes active after parrying an opponent's attack.
This attack deals 40 damage and immobilizes the target for 5 sec.
Counterattack cannot be blocked, dodged, or parried.

talents.name: Wyvern Sting
tooltip:
A stinging shot that puts the target to sleep for 12 sec.
Any damage will cancel the effect.
When the target wakes up, the Sting causes 300 Nature damage over 12 sec.
Only usable out of combat.
Only one Sting per Hunter can be active on the target at a time.

talents.name: Improved Heroic Strike
tooltip: Reduces the cost of your Heroic Strike ability by 3 rage points.

talents.name: Improved Rend
tooltip: Increases the bleed damage done by your Rend ability by 35%.

talents.name: Improved Charge
tooltip: Increases the amount of rage generated by your Charge ability by 3.

talents.name: Tactical Mastery
tooltip: You retain up to 25 of your rage points when you change stances.

talents.name: Improved Thunder Clap
tooltip: Reduces the cost of your Thunder Clap ability by 1 rage point.

talents.name: Improved Overpower
tooltip: Increases the critical strike chance of your Overpower ability by 25%.

talents.name: Anger Management
tooltip: Increases the time required for your rage to decay while out of combat by 30%.

talents.name: Deep Wounds
tooltip: Your critical strikes cause the opponent to bleed, dealing 60% of your melee weapon's average damage over 12 sec.

talents.name: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
tooltip: Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 1%.

talents.name: Impale
tooltip: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your abilities in Battle, Defensive, and Berserker stance by 20%.

talents.name: Axe Specialization
tooltip: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Axes by 1%.

talents.name: Sweeping Strikes
tooltip: Your next 5 melee attacks strike an additional nearby opponent.

talents.name: Mace Specialization
tooltip: Gives you a 1% chance to stun your target for 3 sec with a Mace.

talents.name: Sword Specialization
tooltip: Gives you a 1% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after dealing damage with your Sword.

talents.name: Polearm Specialization
tooltip: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Polearms by 1%.

talents.name: Improved Hamstring
tooltip: Gives your Hamstring ability a 5% chance to immobilize the target for 5 sec.

talents.name: Mortal Strike
tooltip: A vicious strike that deals weapon damage plus 85 and wounds the target, reducing the effectiveness of any healing by 50% for 10 sec.

talents.name: Booming Voice
tooltip: Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout and Demoralizing Shout by 10%.

talents.name: Cruelty
tooltip: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 5%.

talents.name: Improved Demoralizing Shout
tooltip: Increases the melee attack power reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by 8%.

talents.name: Unbridled Wrath
tooltip: Gives you a 40% chance to generate an additional Rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon.

talents.name: Improved Cleave
tooltip: Increases the bonus damage done by your Cleave ability by 40%.

talents.name: Piercing Howl
tooltip: Causes all enemies near the warrior to be dazed, reducing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

talents.name: Blood Craze
tooltip: Regenerates 1% of your total Health over 6 sec after being the victim of a critical strike.

talents.name: Improved Battle Shout
tooltip: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout by 25%.

talents.name: Dual Wield Specialization
tooltip: Increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 25%.

talents.name: Improved Execute
tooltip: Reduces the Rage cost of your Execute ability by 5.

talents.name: Enrage
tooltip: Gives you a 25% melee damage bonus for 12 sec up to a maximum of 12 swings after being the victim of a critical strike.

talents.name: Improved Slam
tooltip: Decreases the casting time of your Slam ability by 0.1 sec.

talents.name: Death Wish
tooltip:
When activated, increases your physical damage by 20% and makes you immune to Fear effects, but lowers your armor and all resistances by 20%.
Lasts 30 sec.

talents.name: Improved Intercept
tooltip: Reduces the cooldown of your Intercept ability by 5 sec.

talents.name: Improved Berserker Rage
tooltip: The Berserker Rage ability will generate 5 rage when used.

talents.name: Flurry
tooltip: Increases your attack speed by 30% for your next 3 swings after dealing a melee critical strike.

talents.name: Bloodthirst
tooltip:
Instantly attack the target causing damage equal to 45% of your attack power.
In addition, the next 5 successful melee attacks will restore 10 health.
This effect lasts 8 sec.

talents.name: Shield Specialization
tooltip: Increases your chance to block attacks with a shield by 1% and has a 20% chance to generate 1 rage when a block occurs.

talents.name: Improved Bloodrage
tooltip: Increases the instant Rage generated by your Bloodrage ability by 2.

talents.name: Toughness
tooltip: Increases your armor value from items by 2%.

talents.name: Iron Will
tooltip: Increases your chance to resist Stun and Charm effects by an additional 3%.

talents.name: Last Stand
tooltip:
When activated, this ability temporarily grants you 30% of your maximum hit points for 20 seconds.
After the effect expires, the hit points are lost.

talents.name: Improved Shield Block
tooltip: Allows your Shield Block ability to block an additional attack and increases the duration by 0.5 second.

talents.name: Improved Revenge
tooltip: Gives your Revenge ability a 15% chance to stun the target for 3 sec.

talents.name: Defiance
tooltip: Increases the threat generated by your attacks by 3% while in Defensive Stance.

talents.name: Improved Sunder Armor
tooltip: Reduces the cost of your Sunder Armor ability by 1 rage point.

talents.name: Improved Disarm
tooltip: Increases the duration of your Disarm ability by 1 secs.

talents.name: Improved Taunt
tooltip: Reduces the cooldown of your Taunt ability by 1 sec.

talents.name: Improved Shield Wall
tooltip: Increases the effect duration of your Shield Wall ability by 3 secs.

talents.name: Improved Shield Bash
tooltip: Gives your Shield Bash ability a 50% chance to silence the target for 3 sec.

talents.name: One-Handed Weapon Specialization
tooltip: Increases the damage you deal with One-Handed Melee weapons by 2%.

talents.name: Shield Slam
tooltip:
Slam the target with your shield, causing 225 to 235 damage, modified by your shield block value, and has a 50% chance of dispelling 1 magic effect on the target.
Also causes a high amount of threat.
